name: Rainy Day (Ainra)
description:
In the 60s, Larry, a young man inexperienced, try to seduce Nancy, the woman he loves, by taking her to romantic dates.

Rainy Day is a solo dodging game, scroller 2D horizontal.

The game was made to be played with a Xbox Controller.

Rainy Day is a Student Project from LISAA.

This game was made by :

Milo Beltramelli
Louis Florance : Game Art
Stéven Lallauret
Marie Leblanc : Game Art, Programming, GD/LD
Magali Lefort : Game Art
Germain Ludot
